body: man, even if the baby ended up being the husband's, I'd still be heartbroken if i found out my wife's been fucking another guy (most likely even before she got pregnant, but already married) while im busy working for her and our child's future, also the husband's been holding himself back not to have sex because he's probably worried something might happen to the baby but his wife dont give a shit, getting other guy to fuck her because she's horny, although if i did have a pregnant wife, id still spend some "special time" with, there's no need for penetration, just enough for my wife not to seek for other man's comfort

So in short loves the husband but still cheats on him because whatever reason, most likely not getting enough sex, the kid is most likely the other dudes biological child but cause she loves her husband it's most def his in the end...
at the very least, it's the husbands child
In other words, a reminder to husbands to keep their spouse's attention with sex every waking moment possible, and to otherwise let them do what they want. "An idle body" and all that...
best pregnant sex ever! especially because its some else wife! Hahahaha
Now that woman is ....... i dont have words to describe her
